Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the impact of being immunized against Covid-19 on life insurance payments by stating that Manulife will deny payments.
Lack enough support: The claim is based on anecdotal evidence from social media posts and does not provide substantial evidence to support the assertion.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Manulife will deny life insurance payments solely based on being immunized against Covid-19, without considering other factors that may affect insurance coverage.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that Manulife has explicitly stated that being immunized against Covid-19 does not affect life insurance coverage, contradicting the claim made in the post.
